alert.note: Alert for Rutland (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 6:08PM EDT until July 21 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ORANGE...EAST CENTRAL RUTLAND AND CENTRAL WINDSOR COUNTIES... At 608 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bradford Center to near Post Mills to near Hartford to Woodstock, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Woodstock, Rutland, Hartland Four Corners, Bradford, Killington, Thetford Hill State Park, Corinth, Strafford, Pomfret, Plymouth, Thetford, Hartland, Fairlee, West Fairlee, Barnard, Windsor, Woodstock Village, Sharon, Vershire and Corinth Corners. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
